bioconda.name: bioconductor-rtcga
bioconda.summary: The Cancer Genome Atlas Data Integration

biotools.summary: The Cancer Genome Atlas (TCGA) Data Portal provides a platform for researchers to search, download, and analyze data sets generated by TCGA. It contains clinical information, genomic characterization data and high level sequence analysis of the tumor genomes.

bioschemas.name: RTCGA
bioschemas.summary: The Cancer Genome Atlas (TCGA) Data Portal provides a platform for researchers to search, download, and analyze data sets generated by TCGA. It contains clinical information, genomic characterization data and high level sequence analysis of the tumor genomes.
